DOC.brief_summary: Women with pelvic organ prolapse often accompany with urinary symptoms or sexual dysfunction, and analyzing the association will be helpful to identify the indication of proper management. Therefore, the aim of this study is to identify the above associations.
DOC.brief_title: The Association of Pelvic Organ Prolapse Severity and Urinary Symptoms/Sexual Function
DOC.criteria: all cases with with pelvic organ prolapse
